name: SQL Transaction Log File Analyze
short_description:
SQL Log (LDF file) is an important part of SQL Server database which stored all transaction details of SQL Server like Insert, update and delete, modification etc. If SQL database has got damaged due to any modification in your SQL Server data then the transaction log file will help you to bring your database back. If you want to analyze and open SQL Log transaction files and recover deleted and modification data from SQL log files then you need a third party software.

Solution: Download SQL Log Analyzer software which is a multi talented tool will help users open, view and read the all SQL transaction log files and analyze the all activities in SQL Server database. By using the SQL Log Analyzer tool users will recover deleted and updated SQL data. If you want to quickly recover corrupt SQL data then you need to analyze last backup of SQL Log file, after analysis user will quickly recover corrupt SQL data.
summary: Analyze, open, view SQL log (LDF file) and recover corrupt SQL data.
